string.name: nettest_text_waiting
string.value:
Moonlight is testing your network connection to determine if any required ports are blocked.

This may take a few seconds…

string.name: nettest_text_success
string.value:
Your network does not appear to be blocking Moonlight. If you still have trouble connecting, check your PC's firewall settings.

If you are trying to stream over the Internet, install the Moonlight Internet Hosting Tool on your PC and run the included Internet Streaming Tester to check your PC's Internet connection.

string.name: nettest_text_inconclusive
string.value: The network test could not be performed because none of Moonlight's connection testing servers were reachable. Check your Internet connection or try again later.

string.name: nettest_text_failure
string.value:
Your device's current network connection seems to be blocking Moonlight. Streaming over the Internet may not work while connected to this network.

The following network ports were blocked:

string.name: nettest_text_blocked
string.value: Your device's current network connection is blocking Moonlight. Streaming over the Internet may not work while connected to this network.

string.name: pair_pc_ingame
string.value: Computer is currently in a game. You must close the game before pairing.

string.name: pair_pairing_msg
string.value: Please enter the following PIN on the target PC:

string.name: pair_pairing_help
string.value: If your host PC is running Sunshine, navigate to the Sunshine web UI to enter the PIN.

string.name: wol_no_mac
string.value: Unable to wake PC because there is no stored MAC address

string.name: wol_waking_msg
string.value: It may take a few seconds for your PC to wake up. If it doesn't, make sure it's configured properly for Wake-On-LAN.

string.name: error_manager_not_running
string.value: The ComputerManager service is not running. Please wait a few seconds or restart the app.

string.name: error_404
string.value: GFE returned an HTTP 404 error. Make sure your PC is running a supported GPU. Using remote desktop software can also cause this error. Try rebooting your machine or reinstalling GFE.

string.name: message_decoding_error
string.value: Moonlight has crashed due to an incompatibility with this device's video decoder. Try adjusting the streaming settings if the crashes continue.

string.name: message_decoding_reset
string.value: Your device's video decoder continues to crash at your selected streaming settings. Your streaming settings have been reset to default.

string.name: error_usb_prohibited
string.value: USB access is prohibited by your device administrator. Check your Knox or MDM settings.

string.name: unable_to_pin_shortcut
string.value: Your current launcher does not allow for creating pinned shortcuts.

string.name: video_decoder_init_failed
string.value: Video decoder failed to initialize. Your device may not support the selected resolution or frame rate.

string.name: no_frame_received_error
string.value: Your network connection isn't performing well. Reduce your video bitrate setting or try a faster connection.

string.name: early_termination_error
string.value: Something went wrong on your host PC when starting the stream. Make sure you don't have any DRM-protected content open on your host PC. You can also try restarting your host PC.

string.name: frame_conversion_error
string.value: The host PC reported a fatal video encoding error. Try disabling HDR mode, changing the streaming resolution, or changing your host PC's display resolution.

string.name: check_ports_msg
string.value: Check your firewall and port forwarding rules for port(s):

string.name: conn_metered
string.value: Warning: Your active network connection is metered!

string.name: searching_pc
string.value: Searching for host PCs on your local network… Ensure Sunshine is running on your host PC or GameStream is enabled in the GeForce Experience SHIELD settings.

string.name: delete_pc_msg
string.value: Are you sure you want to delete this PC?

string.name: slow_connection_msg
string.value: Slow connection to PC. Reduce your bitrate

string.name: perf_overlay_incomingfps
string.value: Incoming frame rate from network: %1$.2f FPS

string.name: perf_overlay_netdrops
string.value: Frames dropped by your network connection: %1$.2f%%

string.name: applist_quit_confirmation
string.value: Are you sure you want to quit the running app? All unsaved data will be lost.

string.name: addpc_fail
string.value: Unable to connect to the specified computer. Make sure the required ports are allowed through the firewall.

string.name: addpc_unknown_host
string.value: Unable to resolve PC address. Make sure you didn't make a typo in the address.

string.name: addpc_enter_ip
string.value: You must enter an IP address

string.name: addpc_wrong_sitelocal
string.value: That address doesn't look right. You must use your router's public IP address for streaming over the Internet.

string.name: summary_resolution_list
string.value: Increase to improve image clarity. Decrease for better performance on lower-end devices and slower networks.

string.name: text_native_res_dialog
string.value:
Native resolution and/or FPS may not be supported by the streaming server. You will probably need to configure a matching custom display mode for the host PC manually.

If you choose to create a custom resolution in NVIDIA Control Panel to match your screen settings, please ensure you have read and understood NVIDIA's warning regarding possible monitor damage, PC instability, and other potential problems.

We are not responsible for any problems resulting from creating a custom resolution on your PC.

It may be that your monitor does not support a necessary display configuration. If so, you may try to set up a virtual monitor. Finally, if your device or host PC does not support streaming at a specific resolution or refresh rate, you're out of luck unfortunately.

string.name: summary_fps_list
string.value: Increase for a smoother video stream. Decrease for better performance on lower-end devices.

string.name: summary_seekbar_bitrate
string.value: Increase for better image quality. Decrease to improve performance on slower connections.

string.name: summary_audio_config_list
string.value: Enable 5.1 or 7.1 surround sound for home-theater systems

string.name: summary_checkbox_enable_audiofx
string.value: Allows audio effects to function while streaming, but may increase audio latency

string.name: summary_checkbox_multi_controller
string.value: Unchecking this option forces a gamepad to always be present

string.name: summary_checkbox_vibrate_fallback
string.value: Vibrates your device to emulate rumble if your gamepad does not support it

string.name: summary_seekbar_deadzone
string.value: Note: Some games can enforce a larger deadzone than what Moonlight is configured to use.

string.name: summary_checkbox_xb1_driver
string.value: Enables a built-in USB driver for devices without native Xbox controller support

string.name: summary_checkbox_usb_bind_all
string.value: Use Moonlight's USB driver for all supported gamepads, even if native Xbox controller support is present

string.name: summary_checkbox_mouse_emulation
string.value: Long pressing the Start button will switch the gamepad into mouse mode

string.name: summary_checkbox_flip_face_buttons
string.value: Switches the face buttons A/B and X/Y for gamepads and the on-screen controls

string.name: summary_checkbox_gamepad_touchpad_as_mouse
string.value: Forces gamepad touchpad input to control the host mouse, even when emulating a gamepad with a touchpad.

string.name: title_checkbox_gamepad_motion_sensors
string.value: Allow use of gamepad motion sensors

string.name: summary_checkbox_gamepad_motion_sensors
string.value: Enables supported hosts to request motion sensor data when emulating a gamepad with motion sensors. Disabling may slightly reduce power and network usage if motion sensors are not being used in-game.

string.name: summary_checkbox_gamepad_motion_fallback
string.value: Uses your device's built-in motion sensors if gamepad sensors are not supported by your connected gamepad or your Android version. Note: Enabling this option may cause your gamepad to appear as a PlayStation controller on the host.

string.name: title_checkbox_touchscreen_trackpad
string.value: Use the touchscreen as a trackpad

string.name: summary_checkbox_touchscreen_trackpad
string.value: If enabled, the touchscreen acts like a trackpad. If disabled, the touchscreen directly controls the mouse cursor.

string.name: summary_checkbox_absolute_mouse_mode
string.value: This can make mouse acceleration behave more naturally for remote desktop usage, but it is incompatible with many games.

string.name: title_checkbox_mouse_nav_buttons
string.value: Enable back and forward mouse buttons

string.name: summary_checkbox_mouse_nav_buttons
string.value: Enabling this option may break right-clicking on some buggy devices

string.name: summary_checkbox_show_onscreen_controls
string.value: Show virtual controller overlay on the touchscreen

string.name: summary_checkbox_vibrate_osc
string.value: Vibrates your device to emulate rumble for the on-screen controls

string.name: summary_only_l3r3
string.value: Hide all virtual buttons except L3 and R3

string.name: summary_reset_osc
string.value: Resets all on-screen controls to their default size and position

string.name: dialog_text_reset_osc
string.value: Are you sure you want to delete your saved on-screen controls layout?

string.name: summary_osc_opacity
string.value: Make the on-screen controls more/less transparent

string.name: summary_checkbox_enable_pip
string.value: Allows the stream to be viewed (but not controlled) while multitasking

string.name: summary_checkbox_small_icon_mode
string.value: Smaller box art in the app grid allows more apps to be visible on screen

string.name: summary_checkbox_enable_sops
string.value: Allow GFE to modify game settings for optimal streaming

string.name: summary_checkbox_host_audio
string.value: Play audio from the computer and this device

string.name: summary_unlock_fps
string.value: Streaming at 90 or 120 FPS may reduce latency on high-end devices but can cause lag or instability on devices that can't support it

string.name: summary_checkbox_reduce_refresh_rate
string.value: Lower display refresh rates can save power at the expense of some additional video latency

string.name: summary_checkbox_disable_warnings
string.value: Disable on-screen connection warning messages while streaming

string.name: summary_disable_frame_drop
string.value: May reduce micro-stuttering on some devices, but can increase latency

string.name: summary_video_format
string.value: Newer codecs can lower video bandwidth requirements if your device supports them. Codec selections may be ignored if not supported by the host software or GPU.

string.name: summary_enable_hdr
string.value: Stream HDR when the game and PC GPU support it. HDR requires a GPU with HEVC Main 10 encoding support.

string.name: summary_full_range
string.value: This will cause loss of detail in light and dark areas if your device doesn't properly display full range video content.

string.name: summary_enable_perf_overlay
string.value: Display real-time stream performance information while streaming

string.name: summary_enable_post_stream_toast
string.value: Display a latency information message after the stream ends

string.name: summary_setup_guide
string.value: View instructions on how to set up your gaming PC for streaming

string.name: summary_troubleshooting
string.value: View tips for diagnosing and fixing common streaming issues

string.name: toast_controller_type_changed
string.value: Gamepad type may be changed due to motion sensor emulation

string.name: summary_frame_pacing
string.value: Specify how to balance video latency and smoothness

string.name: pacing_smoothness
string.value: Prefer smoothest video (may significantly increase latency)
